entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @lloydblankfein Until we have a massive amount of COVID19 tests available, Personal Protective Equipment (PPE), ventilators and other medical supplies, WE CANNOT SAFELY RELEASE THE PEOPLE FROM LOCKDOWN. Trump still hasn't used his authority to force manufacturing of these critical supplies!
